questionTitle: <u><font color='red'>One of</font></u> history's <u><font color='red'>most spectacular</font></u> executions <u><font color='red'>were</font></u> that of Damiens, the <u><font color='red'>unsuccessful</font></u> assassin of Louis XV of France.
